page.title: 11A girl's schoolday
page.content: I get up about 08.00. My mum pats me and says, "Wake up Emma!" or she says, " It's time to get up Emma." sometimes my mum lifts me out of bed or I climb out of bed by my ladder.I either get dressed first or I eat my breakfast, depending on what kind of day it is.After washing it is time to go to school which starts at 09.00.We have an assembly every day except on a Monday.We read until about 09.50. Then we have a lesson that ends at 10.30 for playtime.Lessons begin again and last until 12.00 .We go in to the hall for dinner. We go outside to have a playtime which ends at 13.20. The next lesson ends at 14.35 for a ten minute break.The last lesson ends at 15.50. Then it is time to go home.After and before my tea I play rounders with my friends.
